thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Amanda McCaw
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Amanda McCaw

author: Amanda McCaw
title: Amanda McCaw
text: I absolutely love love love my ash blonde 20” extensions! Initially I ordered the wrong shade of blonde (bleach blonde), but I had an amazing customer service experience and was able to switch out the extensions for the correct color. I was even assisted to choose a color after sending a picture of my hair, which was amazing. I also highly recommend watching the youtube video showing the different colors, super helpful. My natural hair blends to perfection, people have no idea I am wearing clip-ins. I constantly get compliments on my “long, beautiful, thick hair.” Will definitely buy from the company again and highly recommend it to everyone who is looking for an amazing set of clip-in extensions that are easy on the wallet! Thank you Luxy Hair!!
